name: Movement Network
description: The Movement Network is a high-performance Layer 1 blockchain powered by the MoveVM.

documentation.systemPromptExtension: Use the 'movement' standard library. Ensure strict resource safety. Use 'aptos_framework' where applicable as Movement is compatible with Aptos Move.

errorPatterns.fixStrategy: Check imports. Ensure the dependency is defined in Move.toml.
The resource or value does not have the 'drop' ability. Explicitly unpack it or transfer it.
